item.title: Docker-Compose for Backend
item.dc:creator: University of Waikato
item.description:
To further simplify the installation process, a docker-compose script has been compiled. This script now combines the Docker steps for setting up the PostgreSQL database, Redis and the actual backend.

Check out the updated Getting started page.

item.title: Docker for backend
item.dc:creator: University of Waikato
item.description:
In order to simplify the steps necessary to set up the backend, Docker images for the PostgreSQL database, the Redis server and the actual backend have been created. These images get rebuilt every night to always have the latest code-base available, making it easy to stay up-to-date.

Head over to the Getting started page and have a look.

item.title: More documentation available
item.dc:creator: University of Waikato
item.description:
The following documentation has been added today:

  • Architecture - a high-level overview of the system

  • Getting started - if you want to test drive the framework on your own infrastructure

item.title: API documentation overhaul
item.dc:creator: University of Waikato
item.description:
This week, the API received a bit of an overhaul. In that process, the documentation got updated and aligned with the current code base as well.

You can find the up-to-date documentation on the API here:

waikato-ufdl.github.io/ufdl-api/
